summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness in an amount not to exceed One Thousand one hundred eighty-four and 35/100 ($1184.35) dollars against the General Fund of the City of Seattle, on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, by paving the same, as provided for in Ordinance No. 20391, creating Local Improvement District No. 1986.
